name: Ski Air Mix
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Master the wildest international ski slopes with the help of 4 player characters and 11 different pairs of skis.

Alpen or Versus Modes allow you to challenge the computer or a friend as you race towards the bottom of the 5 slopes.

Perform wild stunts and speed to the finish line in this exciting race against your competition, and the clock!
